# DropSession.LocalSession

**Structure**

Describes the session originated within the app.

## Declaration

```swift
struct LocalSession
```

## Instance Methods

- **draggedItemIDs(for:)**: Provides an array of identifiers of the currently dragged items if available.

items.description: Provides an array of identifiers of the currently dragged items if available.
items.name: draggedItemIDs(for:)
